scope.description: A digital habit tracker tab that mirrors the physical button board. Displays a calendar grid per habit, allows day toggling, and keeps state synced with the ledger.

interactions.clickDayCell: marks a day as complete/incomplete and triggers saveLedger
interactions.selectHabit: switches active view to the chosen habit

scope.notes: Ledger is JSONL per-year file. This tab should only load the current year. Backend handles persistence and validation.

acceptance: Calendar grid per habit with clickable day cells to toggle completion
Loads and saves only the current year's JSONL ledger via backend
Selecting a habit filters the grid to that habit
Global tab rules and layout apply without special-casing
